extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE  A grade of C in ENGL100/6.0 (or ENGL110)
Exclusion  No more than 6.0 units from ENGL244/6.0; 245/6.0; 260/6.0; 360/6.0

basic.description: A study of modern fiction, including works by such writers as James, Conrad, Ford, Joyce, Woolf.
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Modern British Fiction
